publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-3656 Jackie Baillie: Congratulations to Aggreko—That the Parliament congratulates Dumbarton-based firm Aggreko on its plans to build a new £20 million plant in the Vale of Leven; notes that the company has been in the town for more than 30 years and currently employs over 200 people; further notes that this new plant will create an additional 120 construction jobs; warmly welcomes Aggreko’s commitment to the local area by choosing to expand its operations in Dumbarton rather than relocating abroad; recognises that, despite the current economic climate, Aggreko has continued to flourish and over 80% of all Aggreko equipment across the world is produced in Dumbarton; commends the efforts of the staff, and wishes the company every success for the future.
S3M-3656 Congratulations to Aggreko (lodged on 10 March 2009) Jamie Hepburn*

S3M-3656 Jackie Baillie: Congratulations to Aggreko—That the Parliament congratulates Dumbarton-based firm Aggreko on its plans to build a new £20 million plant in the Vale of Leven; notes that the company has been in the town for more than 30 years and currently employs over 200 people; further notes that this new plant will create an additional 120 construction jobs; warmly welcomes Aggreko’s commitment to the local area by choosing to expand its operations in Dumbarton rather than relocating abroad; recognises that, despite the current economic climate, Aggreko has continued to flourish and over 80% of all Aggreko equipment across the world is produced in Dumbarton; commends the efforts of the staff, and wishes the company every success for the future. Supported by: Jamie Hepburn, Jack McConnell*
S3M-3656 Congratulations to Aggreko (lodged on 10 March 2009) David Stewart*
S3M-3656 Congratulations to Aggreko (lodged on 10 March 2009) Des McNulty*
S3M-3656 Congratulations to Aggreko (lodged on 10 March 2009) Tom McCabe*
S3M-3656 Congratulations to Aggreko (lodged on 10 March 2009) Karen Whitefield*
